economy.DELETE_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION:
If you're sure you want to delete your profile, press the button below.
Using any command will remake your profile.
economy.MARRIAGE_REQUEST_EXPIRED: This marriage request has expired, you should send a new one!
economy.NEW_PROPOSAL: USER, you have a new proposal from PROPOSER. Press the button below to accept their proposal.
economy.PROFILE_DOESNT_EXIST: This user doesn't have a profile, you should tell them to make one!
economy.SET_COLOR_DESCRIPTION: Use the buttons below to set your color.
economy.SET_GENDER_DESCRIPTION: Use the buttons below to set your gender.
economy.SPOUSE_ALREADY_REQUESTED: <@SPOUSE> has already got a marriage request from <@SENDER>
economy.USER_ALREADY_REQUESTED: You already have a marriage request from <@SENDER>

general.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Click on one of the buttons below to select a category!

misc.CATEGORY_DISABLED: This server has disabled this category.
misc.COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: This command has been removed and is awaiting a cache update.
misc.COMMAND_GUILD_ONLY: This command can only be ran in a server.
misc.COMMAND_OWNER_ONLY: This command can only be ran by the owner.
misc.COMMAND_NSFW_ONLY: This command can only be ran in an NSFW channel.
misc.NOT_YOUR_BUTTON: This is not your button to click.
